fields.description: Cold Cologne by Benetton, Created by the design house of Benetton in 1997, is classified as a luxurious, fruity fragrance. This masculine scent possesses a blend of lemon, mandarin, and geranium. It is a magnetic fragrance for him, like an intense and invigorating wave of freshness. The fragrance of Benetton Cold opens with the freshness of mandarin orange, Neroli, and bergamot. The middle notes are made of coriander, pimento, and caraway. The base notes include amber, patchouli, vanilla, Vetiver, incense, and white musk. With a blend of such wonderful notes, Benetton Cold is certainly going to become your favourite!
fields.caption: For men with power of attraction
fields.title: Benetton Cold Men

fields.description: Ferrari is an Italian sports car manufacturer which is based in Maranello and Modena, Italy. it was founded by the Enzo Ferrari who was born on February 18, 1898 near Modena, Italy. Throughout its history, the company has been noted for its continued participation in racing, especially in Formula One, where it has largely enjoyed great success, especially during the 1950s, 1960s, 1970s, late 1990s, and 2000s. After achieving a great success Ferrari also has also got an internally managed merchandising line that licenses many products bearing the Ferrari brand, including eyewear, pens, pencils, electronic goods, perfume, clothing, high-tech bicycles, cell phones, and even laptop computers.
fields.caption: For a truly masculine personality
fields.title: Ferrari Black Men Eau De Toillette

fields.description: Azzaro Chrome Men is the offspring of water and sky. This perfume was inspired by the closeness between Loris Azzaro and his grandson. Launched in 1996, this perfume declares the values of sharing and of feelings handed down from a father to a grandson and pays tribute to the unshakeable complicity that bonds them. Azzaro Chrome Men provides you with a splendid mixture of fragrances that include lemon, rosemary, pineapple, bergamot, and neroli in the top notes followed by the heart that incorporates coriander, jasmine, cyclamen, and iris. The base encompasses cedar, sandalwood, and rosewood. The rich and mesmerizing fragrances are sure to reach your heart! The perfume is based on the principle of ‘new freshness’ and it absolutely stands by it. It is perfect for men who want to be fresh throughout the day and feel rejuvenated. Azzaro Chrome Men is sure to become the choice of all the men in town! Freshness and good fragrance is certified with the Azzaro Chrome.
fields.caption: For the man of substance!
fields.title: Azzaro Chrome Men Eau De Toillette

fields.description: Davidoff is a Swiss luxury goods brand name, which is carried by a range of products including cigars, cigarettes, and pipe tobaccos. It entered the world of fragrances with the creation of Cool Water. Deceptively simple in composition, Cool Water is one of those masculine colognes that merges with a man’s skin and reads more like his personal aura than a cologne. This is its charm and the artistry behind legendary perfumer Pierre Bourdon’s sleight of hand. And yet, this particular fragrance has launched a thousand upstarts, which try but never succeed in surpassing its lethally attractive whisper. From crab apple and lavender to citrus, all the way through subtle driftwood and hushed amber and musk, Cool Water is a modern classic that is dependable for any season and any occasion. You can’t but like the guy who wears it!
fields.caption: Makes a subtle yet bold impression
fields.title: Davidoff Coolwater Men

fields.description: Ferrari is an Italian sports car manufacturer which is based in Maranello and Modena, Italy. It was founded by the Enzo Ferrari who was born on February 18, 1898 near Modena, Italy. Throughout its history, the company has been noted for its continued participation in racing, especially in Formula One, where it has largely enjoyed great success, especially during the 1950s, 1960s, 1970s, late 1990s, and 2000s. Ferrari Red Cologne by Ferrari, Launched by the design house of Ferrari in 1996, and Ferrari red is classified as a refreshing, oriental, woody fragrance. This masculine scent possesses a blend of fresh woods. RED - the color of success. The colour which made Ferrari famous all over the world is the inspiring concept for the first Ferrari Fragrance.It is recommended for day wear
fields.caption: Speaks of success, just like you!
fields.title: Ferrari Red Men Eau De Toillette

fields.description: CK Be Men Eau de toilette is a classic fragrance from Calvin Klein and can be used by both men and women. It’s a green flowery scent with deep musk accords. It was launched in 1996 and has been a proven favourite of many! This aromatic fragrance is a vibrant green, woody scent that will instantly transport you to a pleasant state of mind with its delightfully fresh opening notes backed up with sensual woody, spicy and floral accords. The heart is a delicate and sensual mix of oriental floras and soft spices while the base is delicious with woody and vanilla notes. It is recommended for day wear during summer and spring. It comes in a non-fancy flacon that testifies that it’s just a superb scent with no frills!
fields.caption: A classic fragrance for the classy men!
fields.title: Ck Be Men Eau De Toillette

fields.description: The perfume house of Davidoff’s Hotwater Men bursts with the aromatic notes which are ready to take to the energetic world of liveliness. Its top notes are star anise and verbena leaf. The middle notes comprise of centifolia and peony rose, while the base notes are passion and fantasia roses and its fantastic blend of exotic accords allow you the experience of the perfect fragrance that meets the gentleman’s grade. With a combination of floral fragrance and your masculinity, you are sure to woo all around you. It ensures that you are being noticed. Perfect for your casual mood, it gives you a warm soothing effect all day. Packed in an attractive masculine urn, its sure to occupy your favorite corner in the closet.
fields.caption: Fragrance that meets a gentleman’s grade
fields.title: Davidoff Hot water Men Eau De Toillette

fields.description: Described as a fresh, fruity scent, Calvin Klein CK One eau de toilette spray is a fragrance designed for both men and women. Blending notes of green tea, amber, jasmine, papaya and pineapple, CK One is a light, modern scent that is perfect for both sexes. Calvin Klein is one of Fragrance DIRECTV's most popular scents, and this classic Calvin Klein CK One eau de toilette spray is one of the brand's most popular fragrances. CK One for both men and women provides incredible value for money, and is the ideal casual scent. In 1968, Calvin Klein set up his own coat shop at the York Hotel in New York City. Now one of the worlds most famous fashion brands, the Calvin Klein portfolio also includes sportswear, cosmetics, jeans, underwear and fragrances. Since the first fragrance, Calvin, was launched in 1981, Calvin Klein has become renowned for its collection of perfumes for both men and women.
fields.caption: A light, modern scent, perfect for both sexes!
fields.title: Ck One Eau De Toillette

fields.description: Versace Eau Fraiche Men Eau de toilette is an exotic experience and a blend of classical and modern vibes. The nose behind this fragrance is Olivier Cresp and it was launched in 2006. The masculine, Mediterranean fragrance has a sparkling citrus opening with woody and floral notes lurking in the background. The heart encompasses a spicy warm vibe from spicy and woody notes that depicts the sophisticated and macho personality of a man. The base is a relaxing harmony of woody notes with a hint of exotic saffron. This elegant, light and fresh fragrance is perfect for a summer day for both casual and formal events. It comes in an attractive blue flacon which echoes the sophistication and masculinity of the fragrance. The top notes include lemon, bergamot, rosewood, and rose. The heart notes feature cedar, tarragon, sage and pepper. The base notes are amber, musk, saffron and woody notes. A definite must-have for every man!
fields.caption: For modern man with charisma and self-confidence
fields.title: Versace Eau Fraiche Men Eau De Toillette

fields.description: A manly fragrance needs to be selected with care, or it can end up being overpowering and stifling. The Original Eau de Toilette from Brut is uniquely designed for the confident, assertive and ambitious man who paves his way to what he wants, yet refrains from being flamboyant or artificial. The soothing and soulful fragrance exudes a passion and seduction that make it irresistible and elegant and perfectly suitable for the gentleman in you. Virile, yet poignant, the Mass Premium Eau de Toilette from Brut creates an aura of freshness and composure that impresses and enchants. Ideal for the urban, cosmopolitan male, the Brut Original perfume forms a great fragrance to sport as a daily wear.
fields.caption: A manly fragance for flamboyant men
fields.title: Brut Eau De Toilette Original

fields.description: Paco Rabanne is a French fashion house founded in 1966. The first fragrance from Paco Rabanne was introduced in 1969. A series of innovative fragrances in distinctive bottles for both men and women have then followed. Fizzy and fresh, addictive and sensual fragrance. Launched by the design house of Paco Rabanne in 2001 as a daily use fragrance. Ultraviolet by Paco Rabanne is a blend of peppery spice, kinmousei, amber, and vanilla. This is an interesting masculine fragrance, more intense and provocative than the feminine version. Gray amber is in the limelight enhanced by the notes of mint, vetiver and moss . The bottle design deserves attention; just like the bottle for the feminine version, this one was made using glass, silicone and metal. Purple is the color of the third millennium, the the Age of Aquarius, according to astrologers and Paco Rabanne himself. It was created in 1999. The nose behind this fragrance is Jacques Cavallier
fields.caption: Fresh, addictive and sensual, that is you!
fields.title: Paco Rabanne Ultraviolet Men Eau De Toillette

fields.description: The Calvin Klein Eternity Men Edt is a serene Aromatic Fougere fragrance that was designed by Carlos Benaim. It was launched in 1989. This classic fragrance is an equity of a range of green, musky, floral and woody notes that blend together perfectly to give a fresh lively result that is masculine yet elegant. This scent is perfect for a sunny summer day and can be worn for formal and casual affairs alike. The smell is a suggestion to a smart, confident and charming man who is ready to take on any challenge! The freshening top notes are bergamot, lemon, petit grain and lavender while the heart transcends into a blend of fresh citrus, flowery and underplaying spice notes of orange blossom, coriander, juniper berry and lily of the valley. The base notes are lustful sandal, rosewood, musk and amber.
fields.caption: For the intense and provocative man
fields.title: Ck Eternity Men Eau De Toillette

fields.description: The brand Diesel was born more than 20 years ago and is today an innovative international design company, manufacturing jeans and casual clothing as well as accessories. Renzo Rosso was the founder of the company which started in 1978, he wanted it to be a leader, a company which took chances and carved out a niche for itself in its field. He was surrounded by creative and talented people around him as well as the innovators who, like him, rejected the slavish trend-following typical of the fashion industry. Diesel “historical moments include mile-stones like 1978 (creation of the brand name), 1985, 1991 (beginning of the international marketing strategy) and 1996. The company views the world as a single, border-less macro-culture. And the Diesel staff reflects this: a wide variety of people and personalities from all parts of the globe. Today Diesel is a global concern with a consolidated annual turnover of 575 billion Lire (US$ 330 million), 85% of which is generated outside Italy. Launched by the design house of Diesel in 1995, DIESEL ZERO PLUS is classified as a refined, oriental, woody fragrance. This masculine scent possesses a blend of woods. It is recommended for evening wear.
fields.caption: For a man who cannot be bound by definition
fields.title: Diesel Zero Plus Men Eau De Toillette

fields.description: Just by sniffing it once you would feel the real nature of whose glimpse you would get through this aromatic perfume. Silver Shadow of David for men is a masterpiece for true nature lovers. It has great mixtures of rare rich aromatic substances lingering around your skin enhancing the woody and classic notes in you. This perfume contains the notes of bitter orange and the leaves of the thick cedar wood. The middle notes include the cedar wood and saffron while the base notes are the minty patchouli and the crystal clear amber. It chants the rhythm that can awake your sleeping senses to regain the lost vigour and strength. The best florals and orchards in it will hum to enhance your generous looks.
fields.caption: Intoxicatingly masculine, just like you!
fields.title: Davidoff Silver Shadow Men Eau De Toillette

fields.description: Carrera Cologne by Muelhens, was launched in 1988, classified as a refreshing, spicy, lavender, amber fragrance. This masculine scent possesses a blend of aromatic citrus and spices with hints of wood. This men's fragrance recommended for office wear.
fields.caption: Special aromatic blend for someone special like you!
fields.title: Carrera Pour Homme Men Eau De Toillette

fields.description: The Benetton Sport Men by Benetton was launched in 2001. It has a woody aromatic fragrance that is specially made for men. Benetton Sport Men gives a cool and fresh fragrance. It is made for the sporty men who want to feel fresh throughout the day. This perfume is perfect for your summer and spring days. Falling in love with this amazingly refreshing perfume is easy. It comes in a stylish masculine black bottle and has citrus, woody accords. Made from lime, grapefruit, sandalwood and cedar, this perfume’s aromatic woody fragrance is sure to reach your heart! Benetton Sport Men opens with clementine, lime, grapefruit and lemon. Its base note consists of sandalwood, oakmoss, vetiver and cedar. Get Benetton Sport Men and add freshness and fragrance to your sporty life.
fields.caption: Refreshing fragrance for the jovial you!
fields.title: Benetton Sport Men

fields.description: The Italian elegant Azzaro Pour Homme Edt was launched in 1978. Its fragrance spread miles away attracting your beloved towards you. The mixture of some of the unique combinations is present in this liquid for making you stand apart from the rest. The aroma of Azzaro Pour Homme consists of the spicy caraway, the sparkling petals of iris, the herby lavender, the grassy clary sage; the aromatic basil, the citric lemon, the white anise and the most elegant bergamot are the top notes. The heart notes have the heart throbbing fragrances of minty patchouli and the earthy vetiver. The base notes are a mixture of the crystal clear amber, musk and the aromatic sandalwood. These earthly fragrances will remind you of fresh damp woods and will keep you sparkling fresh and clean all day long.
fields.caption: Fragrance that draws attention, like you.
fields.title: Azzaro Pour Homme Eau De Toillette

fields.description: Get the urbane and classic experience with Carolina Herrera 212 Sexy Men Edt which was prepared in 1939 by a native of Venezuela. Her brand famously extends to leather goods and accessories as well. The blend comprises of a sexy fragrance that is made out of mandarin orange and bergamot in the top notes. The middle notes hold the yummy vanilla and the thick guaiac wood. The base notes that make the fragrance sexier are the dry musk, the clear amber and the soft sandalwood. The exclusive masculine nature of the perfume exhibits the machismo and sturdy personality of today’s man. This inimitable smell is a combination of rare extracts that are chiefly made to invoke the mysterious man in you like the tales of New York City nights.
fields.caption: For the urbane and the classy!
fields.title: Carolina Herrera 212 Men

fields.description: Bogart Silver Scent for Men by Jacques Bogart was launched in the year 2006. Group Jacques Bogart provides perfumes, cosmetics, and ready-to-wear products in France, Europe, the Middle-East/the Russian Federation, the United States, and Asia. The perfume is made from the top notes of orange blossom and citrus whereas the middle notes contain lavender, rosemary, cardamom, geranium, coriander and nutmeg. The base notes incorporate tonka bean, litchi, vetiver and teak. The perfect blend of these notes leads to the creation of the amazing fragrance of Bogart Silver Scent. Silver Scent by Jacques Bogart is an oriental woody fragrance for men. The flacon is a smart looking black vertical box shaped bottle with silver neck. The woody fragrance of this perfume is suitable for all occasions and daily use. The splendid fragrance of Silver Scent is sure to reach your heart and make you fall in love with it!
fields.caption: An oriental woody fragrance for the majestic you!
fields.title: Bogart Silver Scent Men Eau De Toillette

fields.description: Acqua Di Gio by Giorgio Armani has the bright fresh scent of citrus smoothly blended with a rosemary spiciness and jasmine with a wood base. The woody scent for men evokes the freedom of the outdoors with the slightly bitter citrus tone providing the illusion of fresh breezes in tropical climes. Introduced in 1997, Acqua Di Gio is perfect for casual use where there's still a need to leave behind the impact of a classy Armani inspired presence throughout the day.
fields.caption: For the modern man with charisma and self-confidence!
fields.title: Giorgio Armani Acqua Di Gio Men

fields.description: Davidoff is a Swiss luxury goods brand name, which is carried by a range of products including cigars, cigarettes, and pipe tobaccos. It entered the world of fragrances with the creation of Cool Water. Deceptively simple in composition, Cool Water is one of those masculine colognes that merges with a man’s skin and reads more like his personal aura than a cologne. This is its charm and the artistry behind legendary perfumer Pierre Bourdon’s sleight of hand. And yet, this particular fragrance has launched a thousand upstarts, which try but never succeed in surpassing its lethally attractive whisper. From crab apple and lavender to citrus, all the way through subtle driftwood and hushed amber and musk, Cool Water is a modern classic that is dependable for any season and any occasion. You can’t but like the guy who wears it!
fields.caption: Makes a subtle yet bold impression
fields.title: Davidoff Coolwater Men
